name: CamPocalypse (blueberrymaster)
description:
This was made in 72 hours with my friend as a submission to the 60th mini jam.(scaling difficulty and other mechanics were cut for time, but if you think they sound interesting, consider staying tuned for updates)

A burglar is robbing your store! use your temporal security cameras to pause reality and catch him! There are two phases, day time and night time. In Day time, you can buy upgrades, Extra cameras, and more! In Night time, you can make use of your daytime preparations to catch the burglar. but watch out! if he manages to steal from your cash register, your budget for the next Day Time will be lowered!

CONTROLS:

Night Time:

Put your mouse on the burglar to slowly catch him

(Work in progress/bugged) Press space to Pause Time for a short time. This however, will use up your energy in the top right corner

Day Time: 

Play Button to the far left

Upgrades to the right

Click to Buy

Budget in the Center
